summary: The module defines a unit‑test suite that checks the MONAI utility for converting a UNet model into a TensorRT engine, runs the conversion under different settings, and asserts that the resulting TensorRT model yields the expected inference results.
business_intent: Validate the correctness and stability of the model‑to‑TensorRT conversion workflow so that medical imaging models can be reliably deployed on NVIDIA GPUs for fast inference.
